amendment.description: Amendment reduces the cost threshhold from $100 million to $50 million for the requirement that all regulations must be approved by Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in Part B of House Report 113-187 to reduce the annual effect on the economy of the term "major rule" from $100 million or more to $50 million or more.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. McKinley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
